metadata.title: CVE-2022-3513 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from12.8 before 15.8.5, all versions starting from 15.9 before 15.9.4, allversions starting from 15.10 before 15.10.1. A specially crafted payloadcould lead to a reflected XSS on the client side which allows attackers toperform arbitrary actions on behalf of victims on self-hosted instancesrunning without strict CSP.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
